title: Killing Zalcano

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 13 kills per hour in a four man group.

content:
This article is about money making rates at Zalcano. For methods to to kill Zalcano visit, see Zalcano/Strategies.
Killing Zalcano
Requirements
Skills
  • 74+
  • All Song of the Elves' quest requirements
Items
  • Varrock armour 1 or higher
  • Dragon pickaxe or crystal pickaxe
  • Celestial ring, or celestial signet if using crystal pickaxe
  • A regen bracelet

    • For additional information see this page:

    Zalcano/Strategies#Equipment
    Quest
    Completion of Song of the Elves
    Other
    None
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    1,363,126 14,950 3,250 1,625
    Inputs (50,680)Outputs (1,413,806)
    4 × Stamina potion(4) (20,928)4 × Saradomin brew(4) (29,752)98.22 × Blood rune (35,458)220 × Cosmic rune (25,112)186 × Death rune (34,658)168 × Law rune (22,044)80.35 × Soul rune (12,454)152 × Nature rune (30,442)1,135 × Pure essence (2,269)198 × Coal (32,029)101 × Silver ore (5,340)437 × Gold ore (131,138)332 × Steel bar (143,208)278 × Mithril bar (199,792)240 × Mithril ore (29,995)13 × Adamantite ore (14,300)44.06 × Adamantite bar (88,860)17.33 × Onyx bolt tips (142,480)10.83 × Runite ore (119,372)10.83 × Runite bar (135,005)8.31 × Uncut diamond (23,804)4.69 × Uncut dragonstone (68,163)0.016 × Crystal tool seed (116,603)0.012 × Zalcano shard (428)0.00041 × Uncut onyx (852)

    The profit rate assumes 13 kills per hour in a four man group.

    The amount of standard resources (runes, ores, bars) are based on the average of the highest and lowest values, based on damage to Zalcano. One could potentially gain up to twice the rate shown here (for standard resources) with skilled gameplay, or much less if the opposite is true.

    Note that the rates for the crystal tool seed and onyx are based on being on a four man team, and do not include MVP due to the difficulties calculating it. If splitting drops these rates are very close to accurate.

    Brews may not be needed for skilled players. It depends entirely on how much damage a player takes when fighting Zalcano. Stamina potions are often used, even when avoiding run-draining zones, due to the amount of running required for Zalcano.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
